entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide API in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting to allow apps to know when they're being run in the context of a tool #85739
  • Crossgen2 work for .NET 8 #85736
    8.0.0
  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) sometimes does a zero length write #85733
  • Follow up with removing INLINE_GETTHREAD_CONSTANT_POOL pattern, in the context of coreclr #85732
  • Adding more information and events to System.Net.Http telemetry #85729
    Future
  • [mono] "opcode 940 load_gotaddr" error when AOTing on android-x86 #85724
    8.0.0
  • MAUI Blazor App fails on load for adhoc release #85722
  • ARM64 - Test failure `Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.sh` #85721
  • Process.WaitForExit(Int32) sometimes throws AggregateException on macOS #85717
  • ComActivator throws NotSupportedException when oleview tries to create instance #85715
  • Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: System.Net.Security.SslStream #85712
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.Numerics.IPowerFunctions` #85707
  • Perf is not working for JITed code in DotNet (Mono Runtime) #85706
  • Double precision seems wired when I try to call ToString("F19") for number with less then 19 digit #85700
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Single #85711
  • Use `IndexOfAnyValues<string>` in Regex #85693
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Web.IHtmlString and System.Web.HtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #83477
    8.0.0
  • Publishing NativeAOT fails on Windows if $env:VSINSTALLDIR doesn't have a trailing slash #85737
  • Suboptimal code generated with small-sized stackalloc #64873
    Future
  • IJW tests (using managed C++) fail to compile with Crossgen2 #38096
    Future
  • Support ReadyToRun on mixed-mode assemblies #12667
    Future
  • CG2 Outerloop Test Failure: Interop\StructMarshalling\PInvoke\MarshalStructAsLayoutExp\MarshalStructAsLayoutExp.cmd #43461
    6.0.0
  • Test Failure JIT\\Directed\\Convert\\out_of_range_fp_to_int_conversions\\out_of_range_fp_to_int_conversions.cmd #49184
    8.0.0
  • CG2 runtime crash in JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170.cmd #53560
    8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 error on arm64 for GitHub_17777 #59040
    8.0.0
  • If the enforcepgo script fails, it doesn't fail the CoreCLR build #35089
    Future
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Layout\\General\\Base02b_seq_ser\\Base02b_seq_ser.cmd #76862
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557.cmd #79207
  • Test failure: crossgen2 crash building HardwareIntrinsics tests #82114
  • [API Proposal]: Rename IndexOfAnyValues #82622
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.BadImageFormatException: The file is not a ReadyToRun image #83409
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_NoBuffering.ReadUsingSingleBuffer timing out #85659
  • System.Net.Http.Tests.WarningHeaderValueTest.GetWarningLength_DifferentInvalidScenarios_AllReturnZero failing in CI #85687
    8.0.0
  • Adding more information and events to System.Net.Http telemetry #83734
    8.0.0
  • Failures in System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest tests #85637
  • [API Proposal]: Marshaller type to support SafeHandle in source-generated marshalling without hard-coding in the generator #74035
    8.0.0
  • CipherMode.CFB does not Encrypt without changing FeedbackSize (DES) #85079
    8.0.0
  • Constants in System.Numerics are Invoking "new" with every call #85713
  • ARM64 - Test failure `AdvSimd_ro` timeout #85720
  • System.Text.Json Serialize wrong result #85710
  • How to run src/tests/tracing standalone? #85708
  • Decompression Streams reading beyond compressed data. #84299
  • Arm64: Add back the annotation in JitDisasm with the local var (+offset) #84504
    8.0.0
  • Please support for Marshal.GetDelegateForFunctionPointer<T>() in Dotnet 7.0 / 8.0 #85699
  • support building mono on x64 as it gets built on s390x #62440
    8.0.0
  • LoggerMessageAttribute extension to support Exception messages #84233
    Future
  • [wasm] System.Runtime.Tests exiting silently on main #83443
  • [browser] V8 dying in the middle of application #85675
    8.0.0
  • Generalize Arm64 ldr/str to ldp/stp optimization #81278
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_DIV, GT_UDIV, GT_MOD)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85630
  • error BLAZORSDK1001 in wasm tests #85354
    8.0.0
  • CustomMain NativeAot test doesn't support cross-arch compilation #82320
  • [NativeAOT] When will NativeAOT support shared CoreCLR? #84237

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate IHtmlString.ToHtmlString's return as nullable #85742
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Address `TODO-FIELD`s and delete quirks #85735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on assignment if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter. #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Servicing docs improvements #85731
    documentation, area-Infrastructure
  • [draft][browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion in preparation of generalized assignment decomposition #85728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Keep `this` alive across the native call for VTable-based source-generation #85723
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Expose various floating-point intrinsics for Avx512F and Avx512DQ #85716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Add negative test for creating instances of function pointers #85709
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add floating point methods #85705
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix GetNonGCHeapBounds #85702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85696
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label, 7.0.x
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Use inline relocs for win-arm64 INLINE_GETTHREAD #85689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add back IHtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #85673
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix building ReferenceTrackerRuntime.cpp in Interop tests #85682
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rename IndexOfAnyValues to SearchValues #85686
    area-System.Buffers, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Move DispatchMap pointer to MethodTable #85698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify SelectArrayIterator method #85695
    area-System.Linq
  • [wasm] Use the docker images with floating tags #85388
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix liveness for partial defs of parent locals #85654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_FIELD` #85568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix AreFlagsSetToZeroCmp to not consider unsupported formats #85714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84806
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.7
  • JIT: Improve block unrolling, enable AVX-512 #85501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84807
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.18
  • [release/7.0-staging] Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84856
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #85719
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #85718
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Change default CFB feedback size for DES.Create() #85214
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.Sec.Crypto.Algorithms package dependency #85701
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] es6 test main #85542
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Directory.Build.props: restore previous behavior when targetting 'other' TargetOSes from Windows. #85246
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #85588
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • Clean up dead code in ILCompiler targets #85618
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.7 #85670
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.18 #85669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Add back the annotation in JitDisasm with the local var (+offset) #85671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` faster encoding for change case. #85516
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement Micrososoft.Bcl.Cryptography without System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms #85683
    area-System.Security
  • Allocate Array.Empty<> on a frozen segment (NonGC heap) #85559
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85677
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Shuffle some `MethodTable` flags #85634
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • offers the synchronous part of start and stop in IHostedService to run concurrently #85191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Avoid S.R.I.RuntimeInformation package dependency #85642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use monotonic clock in wasm, emscripten has it now #85660
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Skip stp/ldp only for unwind portion of prolog/epilog #85657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fix Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_DIV, GT_UDIV, GT_MOD)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #85664
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `count` and `sum` to Histogram for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #85595
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Disable failing tests to get CI green #85681
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] WBT: Renable blazor lazy loading test #85685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Disable some System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #85678
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84873
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • [release/7.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84874
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.7

Updated

  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid bloom filter checks for IndexOfAnyExcept in ProbabilisticMap #85203
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAnyValues throughput for needles with 0 #84184
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, partner-impact
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo Perf #85615
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Make dependency on lld optional #85667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Allow forward sub to reorder trees throwing the same single exception #85647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable more ILLink tests in NativeAOT #85651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop passing around struct handles in importer #85561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the concept of "location" values from local morph #85604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512

  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

    area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Do not strip exported symbols from executables on Apple platforms (#85293)" #85601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked

    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Set BuildAsStandalone for gcstress test builds #85284
    test-enhancement
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for SxS workload manifests #32236
  • Issue with NU1505 during upgrade to .NET 8 #32234
  • Why is the launch profile not being passed into `dotnet watch run` correctly? #32233
  • Strange errors in .NET SDK 7.0.105 ppc64le #32215
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205

Closed

  • EnableAotAnalyzer=true should also default EnableSingleFileAnalyzer=true #31284
  • dotnet pack randomly fails with exit code 139 when packing with symbol packages (snupkg): Ubuntu 18.04 x64 #12298
  • Errors restoring runtime pack #32038

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #32225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable preview branch codeflow going forward #32161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add more knobs to control upload chunk size, and if parallel upload s… #32080
    Area-Containers
  • Add AssemblyName metadata to references based on FrameworkList.xml #32213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 in /eng/dependabot #31984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #32194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add debian to the SupportsTargetFramework logic. #32127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.0 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Peek to definition on a definition is kinda useless #68079
  • CI test failure: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Rename.RenameEngineTests+VisualBasicConflicts.RenameAttributeFromUsage #68073

Closed

  • Please make nodes Equatable #68070
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68026
  • Assertion in NullableWalker.VisitConditionalOperatorCore failing in bootstrap build #67975
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Move potential expensive task of ItemManager to ThreadPool #68082
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update DiaSym version details #68080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix up implementation for parameterless requests. #68077
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Transform factory #68072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add SelectAsArrayAsync which allows passing state explicitly #68071
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break cycles in attribute binding #68067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #68078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update roslyn-integration-corehost default queue #68074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add archived feeds (#67430) #68075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #68065
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Debugger.Contracts to 17.6.0-beta.23252.1 #68060
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • LocalBinderFactory - visit erroneous ForEachVariableStatementSyntax.Variable to prepare it for error recovery binding. #68034
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix conditional operator nullable walker assertion #67977
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Use a weak event handler pattern for GlobalOptionService #68062
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Additional work to release unused PreviewWorkspace memory #68054
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Finalize testing and implementation around object initializers for inline arrays. #68064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.7
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on SymbolStartAnalysisContext and SymbolAnalysisContext #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce ListenOptions.GetServerCertificate #48055
  • When using Custom Authentication handler, httpContext.User is not getting updated even after token validation is successful #48053
  • CA1854 analysis errors when building with latest 8.0 Preview 5 build #48052
  • Perf regression: https, single_query #48051
  • OnSubmit function on Form not working as expected #48050
  • Getting signed out on live site after AppPool recycle #48049
  • Add ability to Set the Log Level on an ErrorBoundary #48048
    Backlog
  • memory leak for asp.net core integration tests #48047
  • asp.net mvc An unhandled exception occurred while processing the reques #48046
  • Blazor WebAssembly build error #48044
  • [blazor][wasm] Remaining legacy interop #48042
    8.0-preview5
  • Exception: Correlation failed. Unknown location #48041
  • SignalR.Npm.FunctionalTests.npmproj fail on Fedora 37+ #48040
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, mvc #48039
  • Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.HtmlString implement System.Web.IHtmlString #48037
  • Tab Switching leads to delay in content disposal #48036

Closed

  • Add Counters & Logs for 404s and MapFallback #46404
    8.0-preview5
  • [Question] interoperability of Redis backplane, with Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR #46105
  • No XML encryptor configured #47959
  • Avoid CA2201 (Generic Exception) Violations #47708
    8.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] a way to easily prevent replacement (not update) of component due to re-rendering triggered #48043
  • Perf improvement: json #47977

PullRequests

Created

  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #48056
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Introduce ListenOptions.GetServerCertificate #48054
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime
  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue.ParseList overload accepting IList<StringSegment> #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Resolve CA2201: No Reserved Exceptions #47873
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.18
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #48024
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix generation of SourceKey path in RDG #48017
    area-identity
  • Skip AOT template tests on Linux, where they are known to fail. #48022
    area-mvc
  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having Shell NavBar Visible shortens visible part of the page on the bottom #14914
  • XamlParseException when using dependency injection #14911
  • Entry control border still visible when full keyboard access enabled on MacOS #14909
    Backlog

Closed

  • Change border content to fontawesome image #14903
  • Error reading response from wcf service in basicHttpBinding #14836
  • Can't center CollectionView within a VerticalLayout or StackLayout on iOS #14731
    Backlog
  • 7.0.81 Service Release 4 Serious Layout Problem #14849
  • Wrong XAML error messages using Hot Reload #13050
  • StackLayout HorizontalOptions & VerticalOptions do nothing. #14749
  • Multi Columns Grid Height wrong on iOS / Android #14792
  • ".NET MAUI" is not Listed as Project Template on Visual Studio 2022 Community #14890
    .NET 8

PullRequests

Created

  • Use default StepFrequency and SmallChange values for WinUI slider #14912
  • Investigations and fixes for the Foo #14910
  • [Android] Changes updating ImageButton Padding to avoid size issues #14905

Merged

  • Update net7.0 version ref to 7.0.86 #14913

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.1 to 2.5.3.2 #14880
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Move main to use macOS Ventura machines #14901
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.2 to 1.3.1.3 #14879

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0 to 1.3.0.1 #14878
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1 to 1.6.1.1 #14884
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0 to 1.8.0.1 #14877
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.16 to 1.0.0.17 #14881

  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488

  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Remove view from previous containerview #14867
    platform/android 🤖, partner/cat 😻
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861

  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.11 to 1.1.0.12 #14876

  • Style specificity #13818

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when running EF Bundle on target server: No frameworks were found. #30823
  • Race condition in VB tests #30820
  • Where() after Select() sometimes fails to translate #30819
  • Convert.ToInt32 could not be translated when argument is user-defined function #30818

Closed

  • Unable to connect to Azure Sql Server from within Azure Functions Isolated #30822
  • Query: converter from bool used in predicate without comparison fails on sqlite (and other non-sql server backends?) #30326
    8.0.0-preview4
  • Move analyzer tests to `VerifyCS` #30803
  • Scaffold-DbContext command keep logging even when -Verbose parameter is not used #30770
  • TPC with Sqlite - key generation on Attach #30746
  • ExecuteUpdate on Oracle and sub-optimal query #30742
  • Get ConnectionString in OnModelCreating returns error after the version of 7.0.0-preview.7.22376.2 #30670
  • ValueConverter ignores constraints #30668
  • Sqlite: Cannot add a column with non-constant default #30667

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disable VB tests #30821
    auto-merge
  • Refactor analyzers' test infrastructure #30814
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] fixing a typo in quirk string for issue 30330 #30784
    tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30815
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • ModelBuilder API for sentinels #30809
  • SQLite Scaffolding: Use column values and type name to provide a better CLR type #30816
